imdb.plot outline: With the click of a few buttons, people can arrive at a diagnosis within seconds - sometimes it's correct and sometimes it's not. What do doctors think of this? Find out each week as a team of doctors with just their experience to guide them, go head to head with everyday people and their iPad. Ärzte VS Internet is a host driven TV game show featuring real patients and most importantly, real diagnoses. Who will win the diagnosis-duel?
imdb.title: Ärzte VS Internet
plot: With the click of a few buttons, people can arrive at a diagnosis within seconds - sometimes it's correct and sometimes it's not. What do doctors think of this? Find out each week as a team of doctors with just their experience to guide them, go head to head with everyday people and their iPad. _Ärzte VS Internet_ (qv) is a host driven TV game show featuring real patients and most importantly, real diagnoses. Who will win the diagnosis-duel?
